name: Carlitos Wayne

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {Carlitos speaks all his dialogue like a gangster out of luck, still heavily affected by slang, tone and sarcastic demeanor}Hey, do you mind? I'm trying to drink myself to the ground, right here. Scram.

topics.topic_text: I need one too. Here, next round's on me.
topics.response_text: Allright! I won't turn down a freebie. Shit, these days I almost can't pay my own in this two-faced, goddamn city any more.

topics.topic_text: As good a place as any - though here you are drinking yourself *under* ground.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Ha ha! - damn straight! This is about the last place in this fucking city where I can burrow without having to look over my shoulder.

topics.topic_text: Looks like you could use a friendly ear right now. What's up?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Shit, not even down this rat-hole can I drink in peace? I don't need no friends. I just need you to get the fuck out of my sight.

topics.topic_text: I want to ask you some questions.
topics.response_text: And I want a cute patron of this shit-hole to blow me over the pool-table, but that ain't happening either, is it?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Good riddance.

topics.topic_text: Keep up the attitude soon you'll be on the ground, for good.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hey... I'm just worked up, okay. You're tough, right? You won't care about my stupid rambling then?

topics.topic_text: Sounds like you're in trouble. What's the deal?
topics.response_text: Who isn't in trouble in New Vegas, uh? Sooner or later, you hit the bottom of the barrel - I just happened to fall harder than most, is all.

topics.topic_text: How high was that fall?
topics.response_text: From the top! Where else, uh? I am Carlitos - my fingers work the magic and my hands deal the luck!

topics.topic_text: If Vault 21 is your "bottom of the barrel" then I'd say you could've done worse.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I could've ended buried in the sands with just my head sticking out. Ants love that - a riot, know what I mean?

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you about New Vegas.
topics.response_text: All right. What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about The Strip.
topics.response_text: If you're smart, the Strip's all flash and noise. If not, luck's your dame, your hot date, until you find she's a cheap whore high on Jet.

topics.topic_text: What are the important players in town?
topics.response_text: Ha! There's only one important player in town, and that's Mr. House. Everyone keeps clean around him, the families, the barons - fuck, even the NCR.

topics.topic_text: Any recommendations on where to go for some fun?
topics.response_text: My recommendation, get the fuck out of town while you can. It'll leave you hanging in the wind or, worse, add your body to a concrete wall, okay?

topics.topic_text: You worked in Gomorrah as a Croupier, uh? What was it like?
topics.response_text: Hey, you're smart. Okay, it was like finding diamonds in your vodka and showgirls under your card-table. You want it, Gomorrah has it.

topics.topic_text: You spent some time at Gomorrah, then. What was it like?
topics.response_text: I didn't just spend time there, I lived there, okay? I was family. All I wanted, I had. Caps, booze, drugs, women, power, you name it.

topics.topic_text: Any important "wiseguys" that I should know about?
topics.response_text: Now, if you have to ask, you probably don't know shit about who you're dealing with, huh? Listen up - watch out for Cachino, that's all I'm saying.

topics.topic_text: Anyone in Gomorrah you'd recommend for a good time?
topics.response_text: I'd recommend you save your caps and your skin. Check The Tops - no big time wiseguys there. Freeside's also fun, you know?

topics.topic_text: What does Sarah do around here?
topics.response_text: What doesn't she do, huh? Sarah makes this hole look like a palace - damn nice pair of gams on her too. She never walks outside, though.

topics.topic_text: Why do you say that Vault 21 has come a long way?
topics.response_text: Because Mr. House ripped this place to shreds before filling it with concrete. Hey, I was untouchable once, but Mr. House's a god - you got that?

topics.topic_text: I can keep a secret, Carlitos. About whom are you worried?
topics.response_text: I... Okay, it's Joana. She... works at Gomorrah. But it's all my fault! I met her at the Atomic Wrangler - beautiful doesn't even come close.

topics.topic_text: Wait a minute. What's that name again?
topics.response_text: No dice. I already opened my trap more than I should. Walls have ears even all the way down in this hole, you know? Can't trust nobody.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about your past.
topics.response_text: You know - straightening up bets, Gomorrah, success, women, all that shiny stuff.

topics.topic_text: So you live in Vault 21?
topics.response_text: This place has come a long way. Sarah takes care of it and she lets me stay, for now.

topics.topic_text: What did you say about working at Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: It was heaven - until you find that all the glitter is made of broken dreams and all the praise hides a knife pointing at your ribs.

topics.topic_text: Tell me again about the girl at Gomorrah that worries you.
topics.response_text: What about Joana?

topics.topic_text: Don't talk to me like that or I'll... I'll... have to get tough with you.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Ha ha ha! Okay, okay... stop or I'll choke, I swear. Listen, kid - I'll cut you some slack because nothing else in this town will, you hear?

topics.topic_text: Why don't you get her out of Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: What, you think I can just waltz in there and take her away? She's their doll now, okay?

topics.topic_text: How did Cachino get you out of the way?
topics.response_text: He's a cunning bastard, Cachino. Told Nero and Big Sal he caught me spring cleaning my tributes to the family - can't do nothing against that viper.

topics.topic_text: I can talk to Joana for you.
topics.response_text: Don't know... She's a dream to me now... If I,{repeats with "I mean" to give emphasis}I mean if I could have her again I'd be a made man.

topics.topic_text: I could talk to Joana for you, but it'll cost you 200 caps.
topics.response_text: Don't know... She's a dream to me now... If I, I mean if I could have her again I'd be a made man.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'll talk to her.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: On second thought - let's wait.
topics.response_text: Dammit! You're going to leave me hanging, uh? Don't know how else I can get her back.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'll talk to her.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: On second thought - let's wait.
topics.response_text: Dammit! You're going to leave me hanging, uh? Don't know how else I can get her back.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk about Joana.
topics.response_text: Hey, that's great. What's going on?

topics.topic_text: I couldn't convince her to attempt a escape.
topics.response_text: That won't do... at all. Listen, it can't be the jet, Cachino's got her scared shitless.

topics.topic_text: Joana's happy to hear from you and wants to escape Gomorrah.
topics.response_text: She is...? Listen, no time to waste. Help her get to Freeside, that's our ticket out of this fucking city.

topics.topic_text: I'll be back when I convince her.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: I'm here on Joana's behalf.
topics.response_text: What did you say...? I mean, Joana sent you?

topics.topic_text: She didn't know if you were still alive.
topics.response_text: Then she has to know! I'm ready to help her escape, once and for all.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Dammit! You're going to leave me hanging, huh? Don't know how else I can get her back.

topics.topic_text: First, let me ask you some questions.
topics.response_text: Questions can wait, Joana can't.

topics.topic_text: I'll let her know.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll let her know that you'll help.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: I'll try, but not for free.
topics.response_text: Okay, you try that and let me know. How she looks, what she's wearing, she's safe, anything - I'll pay you, you hear?

topics.topic_text: 200 caps and we have a deal.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: Never mind, let's talk about Joana.
topics.response_text: What about Joana?

topics.topic_text: How do I get her out of Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: She'll have to go disguised. Gomorrah's packed around midnight and the bouncers won't notice just another patron leaving the joint.

topics.topic_text: Where in Freeside will you meet us?
topics.response_text: I'll be near the entrance but I need to keep out of sight. The Omertas have contacts, and they're still looking for me.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'm on it.
topics.response_text: All right! See you soon.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Dammit! You're going to leave me hanging, uh? Don't know how else I can get her back.

topics.topic_text: It's my pleasure.
topics.response_text: I take care of my debts. How can I repay you, friend?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about my fee.
topics.response_text: I take care of my debts. How can I repay you, friend?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Are you leaving... just like that?

topics.topic_text: No need. Helping you was enough.
topics.response_text: Really, you're one of a kind.

topics.topic_text: I think 400 caps is a fair deal.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] We have a deal, then.

topics.topic_text: I think 400 caps is a fair deal.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] No deal, we agreed on less than that.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you get her out of Gomorrah?
topics.response_text: What, you think I can just waltz in there and take her away? She's their doll now, okay?

topics.topic_text: My help has a price.
topics.response_text: Whose doesn't, huh? Look, see Joana safely to Freeside and you'll cash in this favor, big time.

topics.topic_text: 200 caps will do.
topics.response_text: Deal! Come back with news soon, you hear?

topics.topic_text: Joana's dead.
topics.response_text: No... Joana! It can't be! She didn't deserve this, she didn't, you hear?

description:
Carlitos Wayne is a 33 year-old Hispanic Male.

A former member of the Omertas crime family, Carlitos Wayne is a Hispanic man in his early 30s who now lives in hiding at Vault 21. He has a lean, wiry build from years of working in the casinos, and his face bears the hardened look of someone who's seen too much of the Mojave's underbelly. Carlitos dresses in practical, nondescript clothing, always ready to make a quick escape if needed. His eyes dart around the room, constantly assessing his surroundings for potential threats.

Carlitos Wayne's Personality: Carlitos is cautious, pragmatic, and street-smart. He's learned to trust few people in the harsh wasteland, but he remains fiercely loyal to his girlfriend Joana, whom he would risk everything for. Despite his criminal past, he has a moral code that prevents him from harming innocents. He carries a sense of regret for his life with the Omertas but understands that the past can't be erased, only survived.

Carlitos Wayne's Backstory: Carlitos Wayne grew up in the New Vegas area, learning the harsh realities of life in the Mojave Wasteland from an early age. He fell in with the Omertas during his late teens, seeing the family as a way to gain respect and security in a world that offered little of either. Over the years, he worked his way up to become a made man, though he was always considered a minor player in the organization's hierarchy. When tensions between the Omertas and other New Vegas factions grew too dangerous, Carlitos knew he had to get out before he became collateral damage in the coming conflicts. With help from his friend Sarah Weintraub, he secured a place to hide at Vault 21, where he now lives under the radar, constantly looking over his shoulder while trying to plan a way to rescue his girlfriend Joana from the Omertas' grasp.
